Html:
I have been looking through the code and the pdf documentation and I can't find anything that indicates how the StockTrader sample application decides which view (PositionSummary or WatchList) should be displayed by default.

Can anyone explain how this is determined?

Hi,

I see you have also asked this question in StackOverflow: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/20956272/prism-view-loading-in-stocktrader-sample/20957282.

I have already posted an answer there first. I hope it helps.
If that was not what you were asking or you have any other doubts regarding this, please let us know.

Thanks,

Damian Cherubini
http://blogs.southworks.net/dcherubini

Hi Damian,

Thanks, I cross posted here because I got a close vote on stackoverflow so I was worried it might get voted out. But thanks again for your attention.
